Posts.Content: Thank u so much for your words it really helped me , i couldnt go to the doctor today i was supposed to go by myself but i was scared i called my husband and told him how i felt he asked me to wait for him so he can come with me so i said yes that made me feel so much better so now i have to wait for my appointment , i dont think it was a good idea to go by myself ok i know im a chicken lol ..thank u so much for your words !
Posts.Title: LUMP IN MY BREAST

Posts.Content: Hi there im from mexico and a couple of days before my period i felt my left breast was in pain wearing my bra was a hard time cuz it was bothering me so i touched my breast and i found a lump it was painful i got scared but i waited for my period to be over so now that its gone the lump is still there but it doesnt feel that swollen and painful like it was but its still there . . . i am going to see the doctor tomorrow , i've got a cough and that makes me feel so scared my mom told me it could b a sign of cancer , is that true?? Im so so scared of going to see the doctor , its like a nightmare i want to wake up now , ive never been so scared in my life . Any nice words to help me?
Posts.Title: LUMP IN MY BREAST

Posts.Content: Hi, I am 29 years old and i found a lump in my breast last year i went to get it checked in mexico they sent me to get an ultrasound which was the worst moment of my life just to lay there while the doctor is not saying anything and me just looking at his face waiting for an answer then he finally said that it looked like fibroadenoma and that i had 3 more in my other breast i felt the biggest relief I felt like i was born again lol seriously .....but he said it needed to be removed which i couldn't do because i couldn't afford it . Now I am here in the states and i have decided to go to a breast surgeon to get it checked again but , the fear is back , I am so scared i cant sleep i look at my husband and i feel sadness I am scared that it might b cancer actually i have put in my head that i have cancer i know it sounds crazy but it's the truth. I have 4 sisters and 2 of them have had some kind of problem in their breast s , they had benign lumps and my grandma had the same thing. I'd like to talk to someone about what i feel , i dont like to talk about this with my loved ones because they r gonna get worried ...
Posts.Title: Help! totally depressed
